tool_description: My demo API tries to illustrate what it's like to define and expose a SOAP API in current terms and capabilities in the RapidAPI platform. The underlying SOAP service this API wraps is the following public demo SOAP service: https://www.crcind.com/csp/samples/SOAP.Demo.cls
name: My demo SOAP service
title: My demo SOAP service

api_list.name: Root SOAP service endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://my-demo-soap-service.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-demo-soap-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://my-demo-soap-service.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-demo-soap-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
